Serve to impress. From log to glossy, end grain cheese board—it’s all harvested and assembled locally in a small Nova Scotia mill. It even has rubber feet to prevent moisture from getting trapped. With proper care and seasoning, this heirloom Larch Wood board will last you a lifetime.

GrillEye® Max is an instant, ultra-precise smart thermometer for your grill or smoker. It notifies you that your food is ready, wherever you are. It takes the guesswork out of grilling and even updates itself automatically. GrillEye Max uses the GrillEye Hyperion app that allows you to control any number of Max thermometers from anywhere. It also enables you to organize and record your activity in Sessions and keep track of your pitmaster record.
